schema.description: Represents storage that is managed by an external CSI volume driver (Beta feature)

driver.description: driver is the name of the driver to use for this volume. Required.

volumeHandle.description: volumeHandle is the unique volume name returned by the CSI volume pluginâ€™s CreateVolume to refer to the volume on all subsequent calls. Required.

readOnly.description: readOnly value to pass to ControllerPublishVolumeRequest. Defaults to false (read/write).

fsType.description: fsType to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs".

volumeAttributes.description: volumeAttributes of the volume to publish.
